languages.text: "Госпожа Эмелина внутри, в копях... вы идите смело, она вас встретит как положено! А мы пока посторожим... Благодарение Императору, что вы с нами..."

traits.locale_text: "В общем, госпожа Эмелина внутри, в копях... вы идите смело, она вас встретит как положено! А мы пока посторожим... Благодарение Императору, что вы с нами..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: "Mistress Lichtenhart is inside, in the pit... You go on. Don't be afraid. She will be there to properly greet you! We'll stand guard... Thanks be to the Emperor for delivering you to us..."
languages.original_text: "Госпожа Эмелина внутри, в копях... вы идите смело, она вас встретит как положено! А мы пока посторожим... Благодарение Императору, что вы с нами..."

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Lichtenhart is inside, in the pit... You go on. Don't be afraid. She will be there to properly greet you! We'll stand guard... Thanks be to the Emperor for delivering you to us..."

languages.text: “莱肯哈特女主人就在里面，在深坑里……继续往前走吧，别怕，她会迎接你的！我们准备继续站岗了……感谢帝皇将你送到了我们身边……”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Lichtenhart is inside, in the pit... You go on. Don't be afraid. She will be there to properly greet you! We'll stand guard... Thanks be to the Emperor for delivering you to us..."

traits.locale_text: “莱肯哈特女主人就在里面，在深坑里……继续往前走吧，别怕，她会迎接你的！我们准备继续站岗了……感谢帝皇将你送到了我们身边……”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: «La maestra Lichtenhart está dentro, en la fosa... Continúe sin miedo. ¡Estará allí para recibirl{mf|e|a}! Nosotros nos encargamos de la guardia... Gracias al Emperador por haberl{mf|e|a} llevado hasta nosotros...».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Lichtenhart is inside, in the pit... You go on. Don't be afraid. She will be there to properly greet you! We'll stand guard... Thanks be to the Emperor for delivering you to us..."

traits.locale_text: «La maestra Lichtenhart está dentro, en la fosa... Continúe sin miedo. ¡Estará allí para recibirl{mf|e|a}! Nosotros nos encargamos de la guardia... Gracias al Emperador por haberl{mf|e|a} llevado hasta nosotros...».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: 「リヒテンハルト様は中にいます、穴の中です…どうぞ、どうぞ。恐れることはありません。ご自身できちんとお出迎えなさいます！私たちが見張りをしています…陛下を私たちに送り届けてくれた皇帝に感謝します」..」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Lichtenhart is inside, in the pit... You go on. Don't be afraid. She will be there to properly greet you! We'll stand guard... Thanks be to the Emperor for delivering you to us..."

traits.locale_text: 「リヒテンハルト様は中にいます、穴の中です…どうぞ、どうぞ。恐れることはありません。ご自身できちんとお出迎えなさいます！私たちが見張りをしています…陛下を私たちに送り届けてくれた皇帝に感謝します」..」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: « Maîtresse Lichtenhart est à l'intérieur, dans la Fosse... Allez-y. N'ayez pas peur, elle sera là pour vous accueillir comme il se doit ! Nous allons monter la garde... L'Empereur soit loué pour vous avoir {mf|envoyé|envoyée} à nous... »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Lichtenhart is inside, in the pit... You go on. Don't be afraid. She will be there to properly greet you! We'll stand guard... Thanks be to the Emperor for delivering you to us..."

traits.locale_text: « Maîtresse Lichtenhart est à l'intérieur, dans la fosse... Allez-y. N'ayez pas peur, elle sera là pour vous accueillir comme il se doit ! Nous allons monter la garde... L'Empereur soit loué pour vous avoir {mf|envoyé|envoyée} à nous... »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: "Herrin Lichtenhart ist da drin, in der Grube ... Geht ruhig weiter. Habt keine Angst. Sie wird Euch angemessen begrüßen! Wir halten Wache ... Dank sei dem Imperator, dass er Euch zu uns geschickt hat ..."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Lichtenhart is inside, in the pit... You go on. Don't be afraid. She will be there to properly greet you! We'll stand guard... Thanks be to the Emperor for delivering you to us..."

traits.locale_text: "Herrin Lichtenhart ist da drin, in der Grube ... Geht ruhig weiter. Habt keine Angst. Sie wird Euch angemessen begrüßen! Wir halten Wache ... Dank sei dem Imperator, dass er Euch zu uns geschickt hat ..."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF

languages.text: "Lichtenhart Hanım içeride, çukurda. Geçebilirsiniz. Korkmayın. Orada sizi layığıyla karşılayacaktır! Bir nöbetteyiz. Sizi bize gönderdiği için İmparator'a şükürler olsun!"
languages.original_text: "Mistress Lichtenhart is inside, in the pit... You go on. Don't be afraid. She will be there to properly greet you! We'll stand guard... Thanks be to the Emperor for delivering you to us..."

traits.locale_text: "Lichtenhart Hanım içeride, çukurda. Devam edin. Korkmayın. Orada sizi layığıyla karşılayacaktır! Bir nöbet bekleyeceğiz. Sizi bize gönderdiği için İmparator'a şükürler olsun!"
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_GuardF
